root.name: Aquanoid 2
root.description: Aquanoid 2 is a game released in 2004 on the PC. The game is played from an isometric perspective, and is similar to many other games released before it. Players are tasked with bouncing a ball off different blocks to clear all of the blocks. The game itself is available in both German and English; hardly surprising that the Publisher and Developer are Magnussoft, who are based in Germany.
